pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static scenery shot of a public park in a city. The image focuses on a large, dark, ornate monument at the end of a paved walkway. To the right of the monument are numerous flagpoles, and a modern city skyline is visible in the background under a cloudy, dramatic sky.
